title: Readout of Vice President Biden’s Call with President Raimonds Vejonis of Latvia | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 06, 2016

 



Readout of Vice President Biden’s Call with President Raimonds Vejonis of Latvia





	Vice President Biden spoke today with President Raimonds Vejonis of Latvia.  The Vice President underscored the unshakable U.S. commitment to the security of the Baltic states and the importance of the U.S-Latvia bilateral relationship.  The leaders pledged to work closely together to ensure regional security and prosperity.  During the call, the Vice President accepted the invitation of President Vejonis to visit Latvia later this summer.
